en: The following day, Ulko is up outside the house, leaning on a piece of wood. Phoebey comes out behind him.

speaker: phoebey
en: You seem to have regained some of your strength.

speaker: ulko
en: Do you know how I can get out of here?

speaker: phoebey
en: Get out of here? I suppose you must be in a rush. Where are you from?

speaker: ulko
en: Sorry, I'm still trying to figure out whether this place is a hallucination or a dream. So far, I'm leaning more towards the former.

speaker: phoebey
en: Then, maybe you should stay here for a while.

speaker: ulko
en: Would love to, but I believe I left the stove on in another hallucination. Excuse me.
Ulko starts to walk down the path to the North, leaning on his improvised walking stick.
Phoebey runs into the house and comes back with a small bag.
Ulko hesitates before taking the bag.

speaker: phoebey
en:
You should try speaking with the

wizard of the lighthouse

. He'll give you some good advice. He can be found at the end of the northern path.
Ulko walks away as Phoebey and David watch him leave.

speaker: phoebey
en: I don't know, honey. I don't know.
